snippet: The militant, Omar al-Shishani, was the Islamic State’s minister of war, according to the Pentagon.
abstract: Pentagon reports that Islamic State militant Omar al-Shishani, who was injured in American airstrike in Syria, has died of his wounds.

byline.original: By ERIC SCHMITT and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT
byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The militant, Omar al-Shishani, was the Islamic State’s minister of war, according to the Pentagon.

headline.main: Omar the Chechen, a Senior Leader in ISIS, Dies After U.S. Airstrike
headline.print_headline: ISIS Official, Wounded by U.S. Raid, Has Died

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
